Title: [L11] Missing return value
Content:
The [`doInitialReport` function](https://github.com/AugurProject/augur/blob/67c0fec95e65fca8d27751f28a6c06e5247978c6/packages/augur-core/source/contracts/WarpSync.sol#L33) of the `WarpSync` contract is supposed to return a boolean but does not explicitly return a value. Consider including a `return` statement in the function.


**Update**: *Fixed in [commit `8ca7638e`](https://github.com/AugurProject/augur/pull/5567/commits/8ca7638e3a259852990b492c067fd54cd9942059).*
